Detailed Description

Determines if event is vetoable using ECAL hit information.

Definition at line 55 of file EcalVetoProcessor.h.

00181         fillHitMap(ecalDigis, cellMap_);
00182         bool doTight = true;
00183         /* ~~ Fill the isolated hit maps ~~ O(n)  */
00184         fillIsolatedHitMap(ecalDigis, globalCentroid, cellMap_, cellMapTightIso_, doTight);
00185         fillIsolatedHitMap(ecalDigis, globalCentroid, cellMap_, cellMapLooseIso_, !doTight);
00186         int trackLen = 2;
00187 
00188         //Loop over the hits from the event to calculate the rest of the important quantities
00189         for (int iHit = 0; iHit < nEcalHits; iHit++) {
00190             //Layer-wise quantities
00191             EcalHit* hit = (EcalHit*) ecalDigis->At(iHit);
00192             LayerCellPair hit_pair = hitToPair(hit);
00193             ecalLayerEdepRaw_[hit_pair.first] = ecalLayerEdepRaw_[hit_pair.first] + hit->getEnergy();
00194             if (maxCellDep_ < hit->getEnergy())
00195                 maxCellDep_ = hit->getEnergy();
00196             if (hit->getEnergy() > 0) {
00197                 nReadoutHits_++;
00198                 ecalLayerEdepReadout_[hit_pair.first] += hit->getEnergy();
00199                 ecalLayerTime_[hit_pair.first] += (hit->getEnergy()) * hit->getTime();
00200             }
00201             //Check Outer
00202             if (!(hexReadout_->isInShowerInnerRing(globalCentroid, hit_pair.second))
00203                     && !(hexReadout_->isInShowerOuterRing(globalCentroid, hit_pair.second))
00204                     && !(hit_pair.second == globalCentroid)) {
00205 
00206                 ecalLayerOuterRaw_[hit_pair.first] += hit->getEnergy();
00207 
00208                 if (hit->getEnergy() > 0)
00209                     ecalLayerOuterReadout_[hit_pair.first] += hit->getEnergy();
00210             }
00211         }
00212 
00213         // end loop over sim hits
00214 
00215         for (int iLayer = 0; iLayer < ecalLayerEdepReadout_.size(); iLayer++) {
00216             for (auto cell : cellMapLooseIso_[iLayer]) {
00217                 if (cell.second > 0) {
00218                     nLooseIsoHits_++;
00219                     summedLooseIso_ += cell.second;
00220                 }
00221 
00222                 if (cell.second > maxLooseIsoDep_) {
00223                     maxLooseIsoDep_ = cell.second;
00224                 }
00225             }
00226             for (auto cell : cellMapTightIso_[iLayer]) {
00227                 if (cell.second > 0) {
00228                     nTightIsoHits_++;
00229                     summedTightIso_ += cell.second;
00230                 }
00231 
00232                 if (cell.second > maxTightIsoDep_) {
00233                     maxTightIsoDep_ = cell.second;
00234                 }
00235             }
00236             ecalLayerTime_[iLayer] = ecalLayerTime_[iLayer] / ecalLayerEdepReadout_[iLayer];
00237             summedDet_ += ecalLayerEdepReadout_[iLayer];
00238             summedOuter_ += ecalLayerOuterReadout_[iLayer];
00239             if (iLayer > backEcalStartingLayer_)
00240                 backSummedDet_ += ecalLayerEdepReadout_[iLayer];
00241         }
00242 
00243         /*std::cout << "[ EcalVetoProcessor ]:\n" 
00244          << "\t EdepRaw[0] : " << EcalLayerEdepRaw_[0] << "\n"

00246          << "\t EdepLayerOuterRaw[0] : " << EcalLayerOuterRaw_[0] << "\n"
00247          << "\t EdepLayerOuterReadout[0] : " << EcalLayerOuterReadout_[0] << "\n"

00252         /* ~~ Fill the mip tracks ~~ O(n_iso^2)  */
00253         std::vector<std::map<int, float>> looseIsoCopy(cellMapLooseIso_);
00254         fillMipTracks(cellMapLooseIso_, looseMipTracks_, trackLen);
00255         trackLen = 3;
00256         fillMipTracks(looseIsoCopy, mediumMipTracks_, trackLen);
00257         fillMipTracks(cellMapTightIso_, tightMipTracks_, trackLen);
00258 
00259         result_.setVariables(nReadoutHits_, nLooseIsoHits_, nTightIsoHits_, summedDet_, summedOuter_, backSummedDet_,
00260                 summedLooseIso_, maxLooseIsoDep_, summedTightIso_, maxTightIsoDep_, maxCellDep_, showerRMS_,
00261                 ecalLayerEdepReadout_, looseMipTracks_, mediumMipTracks_, tightMipTracks_);
00262         if (doBdt_) {
00263             BDTHelper_->buildFeatureVector(bdtFeatures_, result_);
00264             float pred = BDTHelper_->getSinglePred(bdtFeatures_);
00265             result_.setVetoResult(pred > bdtCutVal_);

00267             std::cout << "  pred > bdtCutVal = " << (pred > bdtCutVal_) << std::endl;
00268         }
00269         event.addToCollection("EcalVeto", result_);
00270     }
